text.*:
See also List of villages and towns depopulated of Jews during the Holocaust

This list of shtetls and shtots (larger towns with significant pre-World War II Jewish populations) is organized by their country.

This list is incomplete; you can help by expanding it.

Some villages that are listed at Yad Vashem have not been included here.

Contents

    • 1.1  Azerbaijan
    • 1.2  Belarus
    • 1.3  Latvia
    • 1.4  Lithuania
    • 1.5  Poland
    • 1.6  Ukraine
    • 1.7 Others
  • 2 Shtots
  • 3 See also
  • 4 References
  • 5 External links
